title: Bi︠u︡lleteni Instituti Astrofizika
additional-notes: This is a publication from Tajikistan. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
This serial was initially published under the title Bi︠u︡lletenʹ Stalinabadskoĭ Astronomicheskoĭ Observatorii.  The ISSN issued for that title was canceled in favor of the ISSN for the later title.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Scott F Andrews for copyright research on this title.
